h2_title: Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: In this rage-filled state, he’ll unleash even more leaping attacks, like a foot-first jump ending in a slam with his right arm, before spiraling upward with another rising claw swipe as he propels himself into the air, and back down onto you for a huge slam that will shatter the earth around the point of impact.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
In this rage-filled state, he’ll unleash even more leaping attacks, like a foot-first jump ending in a slam with his right arm, before spiraling upward with another rising claw swipe as he propels himself into the air, and back down onto you for a huge slam that will shatter the earth around the point of impact.
